text: 3:17 Jon 14:23; Efesus 2:22; Kolosi 1:23; 2:7Kɨ kamaghɨn Godɨn azangsɨsi, ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn tuavimɨn Krais zurara ian navir averiabar ikiam. Eghtɨ igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim, a ian navir averiabar aven ikɨ gavgavigh ia damutɨ, ia tuivigh gavgavigh, mati nguazim temer bibar suirazɨ temem tugha gavgavigha aghui.
